Zop4gVLLLR6i-I_KP7QLLg.text: Absolutely great atmosphere and service. Our server's name was Curtis, I believe, and he was absolutely amazing!! Awesome guy, great experience!

3qXycZwaL0sdKFQKneMPzQ.text: Ordered a burger tonight for dinner tonight. I really wish I went any where else. Food didn't take to long but it did come out almost raw. Outside was cooked everything else was raw. I ordered medium well. When I got my food the manager asked if I needed anything. Said yes I would like some yellow mustard. She said oh no problem. Turned around and began to speak with a friend of hers. After a few min she goes into the kitchen and comes out with somebody else's food. Then starts taking bar orders before she sees me staring at her. Yells at somebody else to get me mustard. Which she did right away. Only to find out my burger wasn't also under cooked but was also completely bland. I couldn't eat it. Just go somewhere else. You'll be better off

TvtuLdkjd5pTGzkuPH6FHg.text: Beer selection was good but what won me over was the service by Kaili. She did a fantastic job considering how busy and hectic the night was. Great personality, attention to detail checked on us routinely.  Kaili, you earned every penny of that tip and I hope you're my server again next time!

l4wztibO_gdryh3cwaNnqA.text: Food was alright. Tacos looked better than what they tasted. Margarita flatbread was worth the $5.00.

photos.caption: Photo of World of Beer - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of World of Beer - Charlotte, NC, United States

Q23cY-g3kcVZEA18v90kVA.text: My husband and I were seated during a busy Friday night. After about 10 minutes a young gentleman asked us for our drink choice and we both gave him an answer within a timely matter. After 15 minutes of waiting, we were told the beer we requested was not available. A completely different woman came up to tell us what we wanted was not available. No problem, things happen. We gave her our 2nd choices and waited... and waited and waited some more. We then got to watch a seat of two and a seat of 6 get sat and placed an order within 5 minutes. To call this an embarrassment of an establishment is an understatement. At least acknowledge your customers. We were completely unacknowledged. Coming from richmond, Va I will say this is the worst place I've ever tried to even get a drink at

ICcXd8K--2p3ICX61QLvGA.text: Food was good drinks were food. Once server realized we were just grabbing a bite before the hornets game she was kinda rude and didn't attend to us at all

6U167ADiWzjDv0RTGh5WmA.text: We had an incredible time at world of beer! The manager Ashish was very helpful in accommodating our large group and making sure we had a good time! The food was also absolutely incredible! If you are ever in Charlotte i highly recommend coming here!

aaWeiYhxiXsHWghlBeOvRg.text: Good beer selection, but the customer service really irked me. Got to the bar a little after 9, didn't get served until closer to 9:20, and was unable to ask for the bill until almost 10. Cousin was proceeded to be up-charged $1 for her drink compared to the menu price. At that point we were over it so just paid and left.  I'd understand the slow service if it was busy, but the employees were blatantly dicking around and giving us the side eye right in front of us.

UYdmWeWHZfO9_LevFh7ktg.text: World of beer is a good time at the epicenter for those not trying to go to clubs and have a more relaxed atmosphere. The service is great and the restaurant is clean...the Mario Kart and card games give serious nostalgia is unique for a bar in the epicenter. They offer a nice range of food to choose from as well. I got the hummus which was great and 10 wings tossed in Korean spicy (highly recommend). My only complaint was the beer braut. Probably the most underwhelming thing I've ever seen. A massive philly cheese steak like roll with a piece of meat half the size of the roll. Took me two bites before I had any meat in my mouth. Best solution either put a bigger piece of meat between those buns or find a smaller bun to put the meat in. In this case size matters.

aTIQdPQfLeeMQTlO4YmT1g.text: The server situation is abysmal. My friends and I had been sitting at the table for 10 minutes (only one of three tables in the whole restaurant) and the server waited to walk by until we went to the bar to order. She's presently standing at the bar with a man she seems to be quite interested in. We were met with a miserable lack of enthusiasm at the bar. Two groups of people came in after us and although they were here for quite a while, they left before they were served. Is there anyone in charge here? This is typically a fun place to visit, but this franchise is very poorly run. Shame.

KTspSo7bo2RXsMTITk59Ag.text: Been sitting for 20 minutes completely ignored by all wait staff. Tried to ask for a menu and had one literally thrown at us. Finally had someone ask if we needed help. Really bad customer service.

ItUY2WPWtge8Qys9VJ2OWA.text: Took 20 minutes to get a 5 oz beer in an empty bar. Absolutely horrible service. I would give 0 stars if possible. Typical tourist trap in the center of town.

QxogD-GiVdRLQ5tr3F_BFA.text: This is a very mediocre for a WOB. I've been to a few, my favorite is the one located in Raleigh. It seems that had way more of a selection and the bartenders were super quick. This one lacks in variety (they do however have several local brews, I just prefer the brewery experience) and the service is slow. I will be back, I just hope they have rotated the taps by then.

Dlu4yjd65j9WYjhxQrV8YA.text: Was a customer at this establishment 2 weeks ago. Ordered a Blue Moon Beer and a salad. First time I've ever gotten a Blue Moon beer without an orange slice and that's in the US and overseas. Little did I know it was the beginning of what was to come. Salad greens were not fresh but wilted/old and salad was suppose to have dressing but there was none. First time ever I've sent a meal back and didn't reorder anything. Drank my beer and left. Mgmt was non-responsive although they did deduct my salad from my bill but Mgmt was nowhere in sight. Don't eat at this joint ......

KTKMLKOghKYFLnFgqUJlRw.text: Moderately busy-waited 20 min for drinks only as people came got served and on their second or third drinkFirst and last time here~they need a better system or better management~anything would be an improvement!

ncVNiBc5FH0is0jbiRlJgQ.text: I was very disappointed in the service.  There were 6 adults and 1 toddler in our party and our food took an hour and a half to be served.  I asked the manager to check on our food and he ignored us afterwards.  The food was very good but the service and the care for quality service was poor by management.

DS_bYgLpngN4PD6CC-L2FA.text: The beer selection is good, but the bartenders are terrible. Very slow here. It wasn't even jam packed and I waited 10 min for a beer. I probably won't be back

pBlzNOy5ZwA6ucENQttdPw.text: I got no service.  Walked in patio side asked a server where to sit, she said grab a seat anywhere.   I grabbed a table and waited over 10 mins before I saw a menu.  I waited again more then 10 minutes, still no attention so I left.  It wasn't busy,  maybe 4 tables with people outside.

gK6cTzji3PSN5Gc_6KuI2g.text: Nice little happy hour. Lots of different beers but still some good wine for me. Happy hour sliders especially since the grilled the chicken like I requested instead of frying like the usually do. Husband had the tacos which he said was yummy. Great location.

cUtoPEqKbOgBg5koY0yZXg.text: Great service and very friendly staff. Make sure you get the Mac n cheese bites they will change your life!

yqn5RU9Zmv596CjD_bz2xg.text: We had a great time here last night.  Food was great but most of all the customer service was excellent!  Our server Curtis was so nice and he treated us so well. He was by far the best server we had all weekend for the time spent at Spirit of Hope!!!!  Thank you for the best grilled cheese, Cali bowl and Tacos!!! All the love from Us!!!!   And.... Ashish delivered our food to the table and he is a sweetheart!!!

j1Y8MPA2eDkREjlgKjPxhw.text: I'm actually mad at myself it took me so long to come here. As a fan of craft beer this place has just about anything you could ever think of. I love how you can choose 5oz or 16oz. You can also do flights if you choose to do so. The staff was super friendly and will help you choose a flight. The food is excellent as well. I highly recommend this place if your a fan of beer.

pI_jKtNwl264tF6A6lRW3g.text: Standard WOB, nice selection of draft and bottles of beer. Enjoyed the local NC IPA beer. Food is average, service was OK. They do have some sort of daily happy hour special.

photos.caption: Photo of World of Beer - Charlotte, NC, United States. Favorite brewery, wish they distributed to Orlando!

52v5J3Cw9g7xiqX2wYsq8A.text: Stopped in here for lunch, I ordered the half a french dip and "soup of the day".    I was told the soup of the day was "chicken tortilla" but low and behold when I got my food (After waiting over 1 hour) it was a seafood and potato soup.  After seeing this I sent it back, as I do not eat any seafood.  Luckily I am not allergic!!  After biting into my sandwich I noticed the aoli was on it (I had specified on the side).  The server apologizes and brings me a new sandwich which then does not have any au jus... What good is a french dip with out the au jus? Once i started to eat the food it was COLD how is it possible that the food is cold when it should of been a new dish?  The au jus was basically water in a dish no salt nothing.  The chili was completely bland and just as the sandwich cold. Needless to say this place has to get it together, there are much better places in the epicenter.  Basically my 1 hour lunch break became 2 hours... if i was not with a large group of people I would of left.  Do not go here, don't waste your time.

mk-tpMMQ9v7YzwYcrjEPbQ.text: Very good selections of beer and booze With both beer flights and booze flights. The tacos we had really good. The service was slow but it was memorial day weekend. Will be back

yS9X1d3W3z65jh0Y4yjRPg.text: This bar wasn't crowded at all at 6pm.  Bartender passed by me several times and didn't acknowledge me. It seemed like there was more wait staff than customers. I actually had to flag down someone that was actually a manager who was very helpful in making a selection for me.  I had to flag someone down just to pay my bill. I did not leave a tip for my one beer.  I wasn't impressed with this establishment. No Happy Hour in North Carolina only food specials.

photos.caption: Photo of World of Beer - Charlotte, NC, United States

qi9L0BRFZIe4cQNcYvJiMQ.text: This was only my second time at this location. I can say the wait time to be seated was brief. However once we were seated it took at least 15-20 minutes before someone came to the table to bring waters, not to take our order or even take a drink order. After another 10 minutes or so our server came to the table and took our order. He was polite which was appreciated. During the time it took for him to come to our table initially at least three other parties had been seated. (I only had a party of two.)  By the time we received our beverages one of the parties that arrived after us had already gotten their food. By the time we received our food two of the three parties that came in after us had already received their food and were well into their meal. When we finally got our food mine was fine however my friend had asked for her wings to be fried extra crispy. They were not and so she did not enjoy her meal. I made the server aware of the issue when he returned to the table; he did ask if she wanted him to take it back but she said no because she did not want to wait a long time as we did initially. He said he couldn't make any promises. No type of discount or apology was offered. Again my food was fine; the issue was the service and wait time for wings, fries, and a salad.

khfTtNxiDgZnpd69_afQVw.text: This place has a decent beer and food selection. That said, the service was terrible. We had to walk in and ask for menus 10 minutes after being sat. After ordering, we saw our server a total of one time. Never had our drinks refilled and had to ask a different server to get our check. After getting our check, the server never came to take our payment. We had to walk inside and pay at the bar after waiting another 20 minutes. Needless to say, we won't come back or recommend this place. Maybe get some people who actually care about their jobs and the customers they're serving.

n8m0oG37K1b7J9HTIqsF_w.text: Nice addition to Epicentre. Just opened yesterday I believe but service is tight and well trained. Huge selection of drafts, bottles and cans similar to other locations. Nicer decor than others though. You can download an app that shows their beer list, which is nice. Hopefully this develops into the comfortable relaxed bar that is so sorely needed around here.

photos.caption: Photo of World of Beer - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of World of Beer - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of World of Beer - Charlotte, NC, United States

X1msxmBJvGOCtN-5uoBo_Q.text: I had the grilled salmon over the spring  and kale salad; and it was awesome. I didn't come in for that exactly; but after eating crap food all week, I decided a salad was a good choice.  Great service, cold beer, and great food, what elder do you need?

lhAvpb9xc9PK47MYNK29MA.text: I was in uptown to see Cher tonight. My first time at World of Beer. Cool spot. Cool atmosphere. Busy for a Tuesday night but no standing line at the door.  Waitress T was great but it took the bar a really long time to get drinks up. I was really looking forward to the Mahi Mahi Tacos but they were bland. Margarita flatbread was excellent!! Would come back but with some hesitation.

photos.caption: Photo of World of Beer - Charlotte, NC, United States

mSVnAR-YquPcXjcImdTeHw.text: The waiter service was good and I would recommend the Malibu Mule for a twist on the traditional mule. They have outdoor patio, but unfortunately patrons are allowed to smoke despite the close proximity to other people.

CjlCXJwYrx8SOJt94WW0nA.text: Sat for several minutes with no service, not busy at all.  Our order was screwed up.  Not a positive experience

Nt1bOnf2N1dMP7a0HfFGug.text: Good friendly service. Great beer selection. Busy busy place . Lots of fun. Nice looking building with some unique seating. Try it for some beers

6B_sSlRXPGHo0FW-Qe0yYQ.text: I liked when WOB was in south end but this place is nothing like the old WOB. It's Disorganized. No hostess but it's not clear you can seat yourself. Slow service. Server doesn't know anything about Beer. Bartenders don't know how to pour beer. I won't be back. I'll give it two stars just because they have a lot of beer.

photos.caption: Photo of World of Beer - Charlotte, NC, United States

Qpjl3y2L4LnOEeEkkBHQBw.text: Killer beer selection, approx 50 draft beers and 300 bottles. Full bar too. Its located in the epicentre uptown. Menu consists of all the basics, wings, burgers, mac and cheese bites, and flatbread pizzas... I ordered the bbq chicken flatbread and shared it. It was great! Sweet bbq sauce with cheese, bacon, peppers, and green onions. Everything is brand new inside, clean modern, very charlotte-esque.

photos.caption: Photo of World of Beer - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of World of Beer - Charlotte, NC, United States. More beers!
Photo of World of Beer - Charlotte, NC, United States. On draught menu

UzbL5CTX9a1DJJBaxZzKfw.text: Great location and amazing beer selection but the kitchen and bar took forever. The food came out cold and uneven, some were cold and the others were not. Getting the meals took forever but our server was so kind and always checking in. The management should be aware of events going on in the area when scheduling employees.

geyk3AQOrd2ZQq6uuQz4jw.text: We went here last night after dinner to have a few drinks. Bad mistake, the service was terrible! We had to wait almost 30 mins for the server to come check on us. In fact the server didn't come we had to flag someone else down to ask a question and make a request.  I would not recommend coming here, the restaurant was not even full for a Saturday so I am not sure why the service was so lousy.

3OVmc2z0oY9vpwQYhvSfZw.text: Great beer selection! The freakin pretzel is huge and delicious! Great service, the staff knows their beer. Nice date night. Not exactly where I would take the kiddos! Nice outside seating to people watch. Would definitely come back just for the freakin pretzel and beer cheese!!!

3CwRNq6-Q1_0jyjYvJSnIw.text: We were seated right away at 6pm on Saturday. We waited for 17 minutes and not one person even acknowledged we were there. Our group of 4 got up and walked out. There were not any servers even waiting on other tables out on the floor. Our schedule limited us to only 2 hours for our meal. We would have enjoyed their unique menu.

UywhREwD3dhI4eaWyx69YQ.text: Went on Saturday around 6, not crowded at all. We sat at the bar but were not acknowledged until about 10 minute in. She gave us menus and went on her way. We both got the flight which were 4 different types of beers for 12 dollars. The place is nice and they have so many different beers to try just wish the service was better.

gdDvK71mW09p3AAAChVkvg.text: I think it will do better here at the Epicenter than it did in South End, because it has the simple bar/bar food atmosphere, without turning into the whole nightclub scene.   Overall the food was fine, nothing to rave about, and for it being a beer place, our beer order got screwed up each time (for example, one person ordered a Guinness blonde, and a pint of plain came out, and the server argued that it was a blonde, which it clearly was not). I will say the pretzel was on point, and huge, but that was probably the highlight of the entire evening. The tacos were more breading and filling than actual meat, and the wings were rather on the small side.   They do have a large selection of beers and offer flights, so it's a great way to taste some new beers, but it also isn't a spot that warrants a solo trip to the epicenter. I would have to be in the area to head here again, only because there are just better food and beer spots in the city (in my personal opinion).

photos.caption: Photo of World of Beer - Charlotte, NC, United States

nGc6FaEdM9zbz6SUr6PnuQ.text: Came out here to hangout with my coworkers, it was part of the an alley that had a bunch of restaurants. They have a decent selection of beers, perhaps over 100. I ordered the English sausage with peas and mashed potatoes. The sausage was a bit dry and not very warm, but the mash was good. My impression is, this is a great place to hang out and drink beer but prob not the best choice for dinner.

photos.caption: Photo of World of Beer - Charlotte, NC, United States. English sausage with mash and peas

lukA33PpXhj-wcWI82_XAg.text: They have great beer options and good specials throughout the week but the service is pretty slow. We waited over 30 minutes for someone to take out order and had to ask several times for service AND that was sitting at the bar. Their tacos are very good and you get 2 for $5 Monday- Friday 4p-7pm but I would only come back if I didn't have anywhere else to go for the evening due to the slow service.

zvTKDoY2Qns48GM8cFh2vQ.text: No lies the outside view is boom I mean it's so chill and you can feel the vibes right. But the food comes way too late it's like have to wait for an hour to get my order. Not sure if short of worker or they forget, but I do understand it's busy and all that but it would be really better if someone could tell how long the wait will be and not have customers keep looking for the orders to be arrive. Other than that it's a good place to hangout in group.

photos.caption: Photo of World of Beer - Charlotte, NC, United States

_oSKn3ulEfEsm2JydLTh5w.text: I dropped into WOB on a Wednesday after work with a couple of friends for a glass (or two) of wine.  I know...world of BEER...but, on Wednesdays WOB offers 1/2 price wine and sangria!  They have about 10 red and 10 white options ranging from $6 - $14/glass (pre-discount).  Our server was attentive, and the atmosphere was pretty low-key (5 pm - 7 pm).      Overall, we had a great, casual experience.  Wednesday wine night just got a new venue in the rotation!

JzGql5AwlDq69aJfxaDzYA.text: Taylor was a great waitress! Super friendly and attentive! We really enjoyed our burgers and beer.

mFfHYpGTQi6mhN9nHXtfKg.text: A group of 5 of us came in on a Saturday afternoon. Not very busy. We were seated quickly.  We had a few rounds of the $3 shots that were on special.  Very tasty. We ordered the mac n cheese balls and the pretzel as appetizers. Yummy. Most of us got a meal in a bowl. One person had something on flatbread that was really good.  I had the bbq chicken and bacon bowl which fantastic! The chicken was breaded but not too breaded and was crispy.  All the items in the bowl added a different flavor.  The service was great as well

photos.caption: Photo of World of Beer - Charlotte, NC, United States. Bbq chicken and bacon bowl

4PN9uK3flVv-BkeE-8ToMQ.text: I absolutely love this W.O.B location and having a chill drinking spot in the Epicenter.   My husband and I met after work one day this week for a drink and decided to check out WOB. There is a small outdoor area with tables and chairs that will be so nice in the summer time. Tons and tons of seating inside. They also have a couch in front of a TV where you can play video games (they had Mario Cart up when we were there).   Typically for all WOBs, there is a large beer selection for both cans/bottles and drafts. I loved that they had tablets where you could see all their beers and filter on various attributes (type, color, ABV, flavor, etc). Additionally, WOB serves liquor and wine. I noticed that this location has food and drink specials every day. On the day we went, it was 25% off cans/bottles and $5 mules. I got a London Mule and it was delish!   While we didn't get any food, they have $5 Happy Hours of small plates. All the food coming out of the kitchen looked good.  Overall, great location and excited to see how they fit into the Epicenter bar scene!

GN6wTLGo_PqmDAdZLUuKsQ.text: Great spot with great service! We sat at the bar and Tyler was an amazing bartender. They have daily specials plus happy hour. We got the French dip which was excellent! It's a new spot and you can tell. It's very clean and well decorated. Great selection of beer and a good food menu also. Can't wait for brunch to start!

photos.caption: Photo of World of Beer - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of World of Beer - Charlotte, NC, United States. Daily specials
Photo of World of Beer - Charlotte, NC, United States. French dip

l2BlwZU17GXCiLWuvhAeug.text: A bar in a nice uptown area. A lot of different beers, but I try none of them :p  There is an open space or you can seat inside.

1eZL8rfVJ0XV4SicjB5cmg.text: We cams in on ladies night and they had half priced apps and drinks for ladies. Had a beer flight which was cool and different. Not to bad then got beers. The selection was good and the staff was very friendly. Had one order of appetizers and they were fine as well. It's a good spot to chill, nothing fancy just beer and typical beer food.  I would return to try the food.

s4KArW2EfCnfi3cyiVllmw.text: If you truly enjoy beer, there isn't a reason to not like this place. If you enjoy craft German style beer, you will really enjoy this place. You will still get the standard local craft but I am still up in arms as to why some locations will flood their menu with mainly local brewery options knowing its easy for tourist and those that live in Charlotte to visit the breweries personally. However I speak for myself, I appreciate the variety. The service is friendly however some days a little slower than you like. The best thing I have had on their food menu so far is the French Dip! It was juicy, the bread was lightly toasted, and the flavor was amazing. My least favorite has been the mac'n'cheese balls because they lacked flavor entirely without the sauce.  I have now also tried some of the tacos: Beer Battered Shrimp, Crispy Beer Brined Chicken and Mahi Mahi. The best taco hands own were the shrimp. I usually have a flight but I ended up getting the sugar creek dubbel.  My beer had a cute little design for the season. Cheers~

photos.caption: Photo of World of Beer - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of World of Beer - Charlotte, NC, United States

-wRJMBMikLa73MNU-NkLWw.text: Bring cash or the waitress (cant remember her name but she knows who she is) added an extra tip on top of my tip. It is quite sad to see multiple reviews of this same incidence occurring to many people. Daniel (manager), thank you for your wonderful customer service in rectifying the situation. As for the employees, that was my First and last time dining with you. You won't steal from me! Just sad.

7zK_ZJAGysjwe7jsDGA7PQ.text: I love this place! The name attracted me because I love beer but the food was delicious as well. Great customer service and she was very knowledgeable about the menu. Even though it was busy we never felt like she was overwhelmed. Pictured is the Mac and cheese balls. And one of the bowls with salmon. My friend had the wings and said they were great. There's outside and inside seating. Tvs and music as well.

photos.caption: Photo of World of Beer - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of World of Beer - Charlotte, NC, United States

ZuOSfUFhw1zhlf_8aGafBg.text: Every beer lovers dream! I was a fan of this place from the moment I saw the name and the endless taps of beer through the window. The food didn't look bad either. The bartenders were super helpful with suggestions and recommendations and the overall vibe of the place was very chill. I'll come back here to try more new beers again for sure!

7bznvOVQJG2sIJ7_JYkleg.text: Tried to give this place a chance following a movie at the elicentre. Service outside was non-existent. After about 10 minutes of silence I went in to the bar to check if it was bar order only. We were assured that we would receive service outside. That didn't happen. When drink overs were taken - they were delivered  in 20 minutes. Our water in 10. Laughing it off with the waitress I walk in to have a discussion with the "manager." He mentioned running out of the ingredients for the sangria (the special.) I wanted him to understand that over 20 minutes for beverages -!is not a good thing. He agreed, and said his sorrys and we'd be taken care of.  I'm not sure what his version of "taking care of us" is. It was not us receiving better/prompter service. It certainly wasn't comping any percentage off the bill.  We are a group of LGBT friends, so turning to the bill and seeing the daily special shown as "girls night discount was otherwise a homophonic jab taken or, just some antiquated, albeit sexist, stereotypes.   Regardless, it was a soft 1 on a 10 point scale. I'd look deeper into management and staff.

suaVKJ-3t6W_Q1furjSO-w.text: Dropped in at 2pm for a couple of beers with friends. Bartender was super awesome and knowledgeable. Place was clean and presentable and service was fast.

photos.caption: Photo of World of Beer - Charlotte, NC, United States. Black Velvet Mixed Draught

8CiaNKFpc2pc7F1aIbys0Q.text: Headed to a Hornets game so we decided to eat at WOB. Slow service and terrible Food! Tater tots were semi Warm and the Bratwurst was unrecognizable.

49ZYVnXC7YmLevh1IEYNew.text: Night out at the epicenter center and we needed a bite to eat so we stopped by hear. The vibe was much more relaxed than the other spots we passed so we decided to stop here.  The service was ok the food was decent. We had to ask at least twice for someone to come clean our table. I ordered the chicken sliders and hash browns. Also we ordered a strawberry flavored beer it was tasty.

qsvC7BjBKc-3COKOI3T_PQ.text: World of Beer is an amazing place with awesome customer service. This is a great place to get a bite after work. They have an amazing selection of burgers and drinks. If you are still have some room after your entree, you MUST get the Salted Carmel Cookie Skillet. Hands down one of the best desserts I have gotten at a restaurant.  I recommend getting the loaded tots for an appetizer and get a side of ranch. Seems like a weird combination, but it's delicious.

photos.caption: Photo of World of Beer - Charlotte, NC, United States. Garlic Parmesan Wings
Photo of World of Beer - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of World of Beer - Charlotte, NC, United States. Salted Caramel Cookie Skillet

A6rsL8S4GVfsRPqIB9AT_Q.text: Would have loved to give this place a fair rating. After 15 minutes at the bar, nary a hello.  Busy? Sure. Just say, "hey, sorry, super slammed, I'll be right with you". Instead? Nothing. Nada. We commenced another 60 second countdown and walked away unnoticed.   Cheers!

zkyOmY8s9ZpEiNFTVzGSAg.text: Another stop during the brunch crawl and probably the best one.  The service was very good, waitresses were attentive even when it got busy.    We ordered the macaroni balls, avocado toast with bacon and eggs, and the maple glazed donut holes.  All were excellent....only wish the appetizer offered more than it did.  Not much to share although we did.   The restaurant has a bar, high top and low top tables as well as an outside area for dining. The menu has several options at a decent price.  They offer lunch specials for around $7.99.    The floors were super sticky.  One on my shoes keep sticking to the floor where I had to make an effort to pick it up. I'm sure it was a fluke as I haven't read any other reviews with this issue.   Enjoy!

photos.caption: Photo of World of Beer - Charlotte, NC, United States. Mimosa toast!
Photo of World of Beer - Charlotte, NC, United States

wYMX3pjC4kPsAdrQXHitbw.text: I visited this WOB last month on my quick trip to Charlotte. What stands out about my visit here was my server Phy. She was so friendly and made sure we had an excellent time here. She made sure our glasses never were empty and that we had everything we needed. She recommended a shot that tasted like Golden Grahams and I loved it!  I just wanted to make sure I gave her a shout out and I hope management here recognizes a good employee doing a fu*king great job. Oh and my Sweet Potato Fries were so damn delicious. That's all I have to say about that!

photos.caption: Photo of World of Beer - Charlotte, NC, United States. Ribs w/ Sweet Potato Fries. Delish.
Photo of World of Beer - Charlotte, NC, United States. Shots, shots, shots, shots, shots, shots... EVERYBODY!
Photo of World of Beer - Charlotte, NC, United States. Menu with dranks

f3hTHoKnpDTaKLQ5Y9kavg.text: Thank you Ashish, David, and JD for our experience today! I posted a previous review in which I downgraded my star rating due to a recent experience. But I'm happy to say that the exceptional experience today was amazing. It's not many times that owners or operators take the time to respond to reviews let alone invite you back for a better experience. That is what we received today and it was great. Again, thank you all! It was worth the trip back!

photos.caption: Photo of World of Beer - Charlotte, NC, United States

qW2apOl1ot2LruiZzGiXQw.text: The food was really good. I enjoyed my shrimp tacos. The atmosphere was great and really chill. The service could have been better. It wasn't that crowded, but everything took a long time to come out.

photos.caption: Photo of World of Beer - Charlotte, NC, United States. Shrimp taco

G012DucAsGP0kGmIGajDCA.text: What in the...1.5 hours later...I ordered 2 tacos.  Drinks were mediocre.  The waitress is the only reason this place got any stars.  You deserve more- eat somewhere else.

7iPvAw6uASL3s8CIQbS-6w.text: Came in on a Sunday afternoon and the place was packed. And they only had one bartender on and it took almost 30 minutes to order one drink at the bar.  It's a shame because we had to leave with only half of our party getting served.  Management really needs to get it together at this place

qMsAukD0KjN5jzY6Q32-0g.text: My boyfriend and I came here before a comedy show at the Knights Theatre. The service was super friendly, the food was good (though I wish they had a larger selection), and the beer was good.

photos.caption: Photo of World of Beer - Charlotte, NC, United States. Cinco De Mayo trying be festive ya know?
Photo of World of Beer - Charlotte, NC, United States. Flight of beers

uBbP34Oq2jYdS47UucjpIA.text: I would've give the 5 stars but, the name of the establishment is deceiving, not as many beers as you think but, yes they have plenty of different beers. Good snacks and good ambience, if I come back to Charlotte I definitely will stop by World of Beer

photos.caption: Photo of World of Beer - Charlotte, NC, United States

J_9ybSUF0iwr3BzaVk8Rlg.text: Came here late one Sunday night with some friends who were in town. Originally, we had our sights set on another restaurant in the EpiCenter, but with it being late, their kitchen had closed.   I didn't want anything too heavy, so I ordered the Wob Cobb. It arrived looking like the most interesting salad I'd ever seen! The presentation was fantastic. The taste, not so much. It overall just lacked flavor. I wasn't impressed.

photos.caption: Photo of World of Beer - Charlotte, NC, United States. Wob Cobb

9lKVAElG2tqiYWM_NZYncw.text: Recently I've heard so much buzz( pun intended) about world of beer and the amazing selection of beer they have to offer, as we walked In we immediately noticed the huge inside sitting area as well as an nice outside patio. The selection didn't disappoint and I decided to try Lieutenant Dank by wicked weed, delicious if I may say so myself. Service was very helpful and explained the selection perfectly. If you love beer, this is the place for you.

photos.caption: Photo of World of Beer - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of World of Beer - Charlotte, NC, United States

CP1S_L_BW5RonRXxmo6WQg.text: Came for Happy Hour on Friday and it was a little busy but seemed to be a lot of workers as well. We grabbed two seats at the bar and it took a while just to get menus, even though it was someone right there just drying dishes. After a while I just asked her for a menu, she looked bothered then asked someone else to get it for us. Once she noticed he gave us an empty book she got us the right menus. I kind of then assumed maybe she wasn't a bartender until after she took her time drying glasses she finally started taking some orders. Shorty after another bartender asked have we been helped and we said no, he replied he would be right back to help us. Right after a different bartender came asked the same question but took our drink order. We got an Old Fashion & a Mule, both made pretty fast. They had a $5 food menu for HH. We ordered the Mac n Cheese bits which were really good, loved the sauce that went with them. Also ordered the Barbacoa tacos and the were good as well. Could have got 4 stars but service wasn't the best.

photos.caption: Photo of World of Beer - Charlotte, NC, United States. Barbacoa Tacos
Photo of World of Beer - Charlotte, NC, United States. Mac n Cheese bites
Photo of World of Beer - Charlotte, NC, United States. Titos Mule &amp; $5 Old Fashion

xU9sYzA6-yPqIAIqL_T6aA.text: The food was good... we came in about 4pm on a Sunday and there were about 5 total other people in the restaurant. They were all too busy talking to each other to realized we wanted or bill. Would eat again possibly

1ZEyD8IRgcS4YPbsFhLjkQ.text: Step in we ask for beers and waters. Wait 20 mins and try and order food. Give up and ask for our check they dont know what we ordered wont ask. Then charge us more than the menu says per beer. 30 mins later we are out the door buying food somewhere else

photos.caption: Photo of World of Beer - Charlotte, NC, United States

qbnkTIBPlfODbDV7_FYIZQ.text: Kinda remember having WOB located on South Blvd a couple years ago, which shut down. I was lucky to come to the new location at Epicenter around lunch time yesterday. Far from crowded. I got this tasty raspberry flavored beer which was awesome. Our waitress was good at explaining the beer menu to us. Food menu looks good too. Hoping WOB will open more locations in the future.

kziu4PSLbar-QJUZr9bKVA.text: This place was good. I'd honestly give it a three because of my barely cold, skunk line Blue Moon beer on tap BUT my fish tacos were awesome.   We stopped in on a Sunday evening and the place was pretty busy but we got a table with no problem. We were met by staff very quickly and given menus. I ordered a Blue Moon on tap and my bros asked for an IPA recommendation. The waiter, bless his heart brought them some pineapple beer that wasn't even close to an IPA lol  Anyway the savior of the restaurant for me were the Mahi Mahi tacos. Perfectly cooked fish with I believe blackened spice on them with coleslaw and house made tarter sauce. Delicious! My bros got the wings and steak. Both were good according to them. We all shared some Mac n cheese bites that were very good as well.   I'd recommend this place. Their food is good(get the Mahi Mahi tacos!) and the beer selection is impressive. Go beyond Blue Moon though lol They have well over 100 beers in cans/bottles in case you don't want to risk skunk tap line

To5bZges_9QTgoxb5-6CFQ.text: Really good food but the service is a little too slow. The music and crowd size were pretty good, just looked like they might've been short staffed. On a regular day, that might not have been as big of an issue, but we were really hungry & had just come from the airport so the amount of time it took for our drinks to come and then to wait another 30 mins(1 hour total) for our food was a bit much.

MsdtY-8Pi9n3kR5Gy_gNCA.text: We came here to participate in The Office themed trivia. They had some great specials running. However, We had very poor service. The waiter seemed to forget about us and mix up our orders often. We had to ask for our bill multiple times. Then the bills were incorrect. However, I give this place four stars because the food is really good for pub food. I would recommend the pretzel! And also the nachos!

GUTMUW7ASndykwLvgzTsxw.text: I'm not sure if I'm completely sold on this World of Beer location.   They are located on the corner of the 2nd floor at the EpiCenter. It's a large location with multiple tables inside. Some of the tables are awkwardly placed so you have to squeeze past people just to leave.   For some reason, every World of Beer has slow service and this one is no exception.   We got a flight that was nice, cold, and enjoyable. We also ordered the pretzel and got upsold on the beer cheese. The pretzel was delicious but the beer cheese is just not good at all to me. For my meal, I ordered the bowl Bibimbap and it was pretty good. The only downside is that I could tell it was sitting in the window for a good minute because it wasn't served hot. The flavors were spot on and the portion was perfect. My boyfriend got the beer brat and the portion was laughable. Poor thing. He said it was okay taste wise but he ended up eating some of my food to fill him up.   Overall, I would return for beer and appetizers if I was at the EpiCenter but I wouldn't go out of my way to visit.

photos.caption: Photo of World of Beer - Charlotte, NC, United States. Bibimbap Bowl
